content: Hello everyone,I wanted to share some exciting news about Firepot Finance, the DeFi platform that makes crypto easy and fun. Firepot Finance is launching its HOTT token soon on Camelot Pool, Arbitrum native DEX, and you don’t want to miss it! The HOTT token will be the fuel that powers the Firepot app, an innovative platform that combines omnichain functionality, robo-advisory services, and comprehensive automation to provide a frictionless DeFi experience.If you’re interested in joining the Firepot community and getting your share of the HOTT token, you can participate in their meme contest and Zealy campaign to earn rewards. You can also follow Firepot Finance on Twitter, Telegram, Discord, LinkedIn, Medium, YouTube, and GitHub to stay up-to-date with the latest news and connect with like-minded individuals.Firepot Finance hosted three Twitter Spaces in August 2023 to discuss the latest updates on the project, the $HOTT token launch, and the partnership with Arbitrium. You can read the recap of these events on their Medium page.If you have any questions about Firepot Finance or the HOTT token launch, feel free to ask them here or check out their FAQs page. Firepot Finance is the future of DeFi, and you don’t want to miss it!
